# Vedlegg E - Kritiske t-verdier - tohalet test ("two-tailed test") {.unnumbered}

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

library(kableExtra)

conf_levels <- c(0.001, 0.005, 0.01, 0.025, 0.05, 0.10, 0.15, 0.20, 0.25)  

data_t <- round(data.frame(df1 = abs(qt(p = conf_levels/2, df = 1)),
```
